channel.title: Weapon special attacks help
channel.description:
How can I make it where when I use the spec of a certain weapon you do 35% extra damage for that special than your max otherwise? If that can't be done, maybe make it hit 20 points higher than your max hit without the spec(with that weapon)
And note : also I want to make it where theres only a 40% chance of hitting the max of this.
